name: Vercel
title: vercel.com
shortDescription: Vercel is a cloud platform for frontend developers, enabling them to build, preview, and ship websites and applications with ease. It integrates directly with Git for seamless deployment and offers features like real-time feedback, instant rollbacks, and scalable infrastructure. Ideal for teams looking to streamline their development process, Vercel supports technologies like Next.js and provides solutions for AI apps, e-commerce, and more.
cons: May require familiarity with specific frameworks like Next.js
Potentially higher cost for high-scale usage
Limited customization options for backend services
